name: Ghost Mode
description:
Ghost mood is a small puzzle-platformer-type game made for "Gamedev.tv game jam 2022". I'm a little bit busy cause I'm moving... I made this game in two days that's why I can't add juice to the game. In this game, at first, you play as a platformer character... But when you fall into a trap and die you can enter ghost mode and go through walls.

game source : Ghost Mode
